level.heading: RENTAL HOUSING CASES – CALCULATING DEADLINES (ยง 1-2925)

level.text: 2925.1 The Rules governing calculating deadlines are found in Section 2812.
The timeliness of any appeal to the Commission shall be governed by the Rentalousing Commission Rules in 14 DCMR ยง 3802.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 5674, 5676 (July 14, 2006); asmended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 12541, 12577 (December1, 2010).
